config.directions: Use the slider to learn more about art careers in the community.
config.interactiveTitle: Use the slider to learn more about art careers in the community.

entries.title: Animator
entries.content:
Video of: Animator
A person's hand can be seen drawing the initial drawing for a comic strip. Electronic style music plays in the background to create a productive harmony.

entries.title: Baker
entries.content:
Video of: Baker
A baker's hands are seen creating a stuffed cookie by adding frosting to the bottom of one cookie and placing the bottom of another cookie on top. A light-sounding electronic keyboard with hand clapping and tapping plays in the background to create an inspiring melody.

entries.title: Video Game Designer
entries.content:
Video of: Video Game Designer
A person can be seen creating a video game aircraft on a computer. An electronic beat plays in the background as an electric guitar joins in to create hopeful background music.

entries.title: Interior Designer
entries.content:
Video of: Interior Designer
A person sits at a desk with paint cards in front of her with a digital drawing of an interior space. An upbeat melody piano and tambourine melody plays in the background.
